name: busy spider
description:
Lonely fight
You are the only one in the game, not only need to ensure the safety of your territory, but also need to resist the tide of enemies, and seize the opportunity to attack in order to win the final victory.
Invigorating battle
3D omnidirectional viewing angle, immersive gaming experience, unleash true self in a drastic battle.
Wisdom and courageIn
the fierce battle, use the terrain, use the tactics, hide yourself in the jungle, defeat the enemy, and win the fruits of victory.
